entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as 'himself Serpent-tongue' indicating he has some sort of connection or reputation. ("Slytherin himself Serpent-tongue.")

entities.name: ernie
entities.description: Ernie is a member of the Hufflepuffs and is speaking to his fellow students about Harry Potter. ("There was some heavy murmuring at this, and Ernie went on,")

entities.name: hannah
entities.description: Hannah is a student who expresses uncertainty about Harry Potter's character. ("He always seems so nice, though," said Hannah uncertainly, "and, well, he’s the one who made You Know Who disappear.")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as having a run-in with Filch and being attacked by You Know Who. ("Potter had some sort of run-in with Filch. Next thing we know , Filch’s cat’s attacked.")

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is mentioned as having a run-in with Harry Potter and his cat being attacked. ("Potter had some sort of run-in with Filch. Next thing we know , Filch’s cat’s attacked.")

entities.name: creevey
entities.description: Creevey is a first-year student who was annoying Harry Potter at the Quidditch match and was later attacked. ("That first-year, Creevey , was annoying Potter at the Quidditch match, taking pictures of him while he was lying in the mud.")

entities.name: you know who
entities.description: You Know Who is mentioned as being defeated by Harry Potter. ("He can’t be all bad, can he?’ Ernie lowered his voice mysteriously , the Hufflepuffs bent closer, and Harry edged nearer so that he could catch Ernie’s words.")

relationships.description: Ernie is speaking about Harry Potter to his fellow students. ("There was some heavy murmuring at this, and Ernie went on,")
Ernie mentions Filch in connection with Harry Potter. ("Potter had some sort of run-in with Filch.")
